category: news
title: "A robot vision system that diminishes occlusions using mirror reflections"
excerpt: "To navigate their surroundings safely and most effectively, robots should be supported by a highly performing computer vision system. One of the greatest challenges when developing computer vision systems for robots is to limit occlusions so that the robot can sense most of its surroundings."
